hero_p: We are a language academy specialized in teaching English, Spanish, Catalan, and German to anyone who needs or would like to learn.
contact_h3: Don't hesitate to send us an email with your questions!
email_form_placeholder_contenido: I would like to inquire about the fees
about_card_1_text: At KLS, we offer English classes designed for all levels, from beginners to advanced. Our courses are taught by highly qualified and experienced teachers who use innovative and dynamic teaching methods to help you learn quickly and effectively.
about_card_2_text: We also offer German classes for all levels, both in-person and online. With a methodology that will make you fall in love with the language from the very first minute.
about_card_3_text: Spanish classes for all audiences. Are you coming from abroad and need online classes for your vacation in Spain? This is your school. Do you want to pass all those exams that are so challenging? This is your school.
about_card_4_text: From anywhere in the world, we are up to date and can offer classes online to serve those who cannot come to our physical location.
about_card_5_text: We love teaching the little ones! Your children don't fail in school because they're not capable, they fail because they're not being taught properly! We take advantage of the youngest ones' learning ability so that they like the language they want to learn and master it with ease.
about_card_6_text: Whether you're an adult or a child, bringing out that creative side will help you learn everything much more smoothly, it doesn't have to be tedious or difficult to learn, it can be beautiful, try it with us!
footer_text: Call us if you have any questions
